faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about SnapStory
faq.answer1: SnapStory is an AI-powered platform that transforms your photos into engaging stories. Using advanced artificial intelligence, we help you create compelling narratives from your images with just a few clicks. Whether you're a content creator, business owner, or just someone who loves sharing stories, SnapStory makes it easy to bring your photos to life.
faq.answer2: SnapStory uses advanced AI algorithms to analyze your image and generate a story based on its content.
faq.answer3: SnapStory offers both free and premium plans. With our free plan, you can create basic stories and access essential features. Our premium plans unlock advanced features like custom branding, higher resolution outputs, priority processing, and unlimited story generation. Visit our pricing page to learn more about our plans and choose the one that best fits your needs.
faq.question4: What types of photos work best with SnapStory?
faq.answer4: SnapStory works with virtually any type of photo, but the best results come from clear, high-quality images that tell a story or capture a moment. This could include travel photos, event pictures, product images, or personal memories. Our AI is trained to recognize and interpret a wide range of subjects, scenes, and emotions.
faq.answer5: Yes, your image is private and secure. We do not share your image or story with anyone without your permission.
faq.answer6: Yes, SnapStory allows you to export your story in multiple formats, including PDF, HTML, and more.
faq.question7: Can I use SnapStory for commercial purposes?
faq.answer7: Yes! SnapStory offers commercial licenses for businesses. Our Enterprise plan includes features like bulk processing, API access, and white-labeling options. Contact our sales team for custom solutions tailored to your business needs.
faq.question8: What is the difference between the free plan and the premium plans?
faq.answer8: The free plan allows you to generate up to 5 stories per day. The premium plans unlock additional features like custom branding, higher resolution outputs, priority processing, and unlimited story generation.
